metadata.title: CVE-2018-7753 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Bleach 2.1.x before 2.1.3. Attributes that haveURI values weren't properly sanitized if the values contained characterentities. Using character entities, it was possible to construct a URIvalue with a scheme that was not allowed that would slide throughunsanitized.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7753` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-bleach - 3.1.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-bleach package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.1-1').
